Package arcade.env.grid

Class HexAgentGrid

java.lang.Object
arcade.env.grid.AgentGrid
arcade.env.grid.HexAgentGrid
All Implemented Interfaces:
Grid
public class HexAgentGrid
extends AgentGrid
Extension of AgentGrid for hexagonal grid.

Each hexagon location has six positions. Uses HexLocation as Location object.

Since:
2.0
Version:
2.3.0
